content: I'm actually thinking of trying out a more cooperative approach this time. Since we've had a mix of competitive and cooperative games, I'm curious to see how Ticket to Ride would work if we focused on working together to complete routes and share knowledge. It might be a nice change of pace from the more competitive games we've played, and it could lead to some interesting discussions and negotiations around the table. What do you think about cooperative play in Ticket to Ride?
